analysis.key_quote: The proposed rule to "increase career employee accountability" (Schedule F) will turn key personnel at agencies into political appointees. This will erode our nation's scientific prowess, injecting bias into agencies such as the National Institutes of Health (NIH).
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization and its negative impact on scientific integrity, emphasizing the need for scientific agencies to operate free from political pressures.
